price: Baranavuga bati “Kuki atamanurirwa igitangaza giturutse kwa Nyagasani we (kitwemeza ukuri kwe)? Vuga (yewe Muhamadi) uti “Mu by’ukuri ubumenyi bw’ibitagaragara ni ubwa Allah; ngaho nimutegereze, mu by’ukuri ndi kumwe namwe mu bategereje (uko Allah azadukiranura).”
arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ لَوۡلَآ أُنزِلَ عَلَيۡهِ ءَايَةٞ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦۖ فَقُلۡ إِنَّمَا ٱلۡغَيۡبُ لِلَّهِ فَٱنتَظِرُوٓاْ إِنِّي مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمُنتَظِرِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlūna lawlā unzila ʿalayhi āyatun min rabbihi faqul innamā al-ghaybu lillahi fa-intaẓirū innī maʿakum mina al-muntaẓirīna
